text_block_list.text: Throughout every era, and every corner of the world, exceptional individuals who seem blessed from birth emerge.
This was no different at Tracen Academy ——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: First place goes to Symboli Rudolf! She is in a class of her own, effortlessly leaving her competitors in the dust! This looks like a strong statement from Symboli Rudolf!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Phuh… It seems I've comfortably secured victory.
The Selection Race serves as the stage where promising horsegirls aiming to make their debut showcase their abilities before the trainers present ——
Symboli Rudolf had clinched the top spot, leaving a substantial gap between her and the runner-up.
The trainers, myself included, were left in a state of disbelief after witnessing her overwhelming ability, which had exceeded the already high expectations placed on her……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I extend my heartfelt gratitude to all those who cheered for me from the stands. Your support made today's victory possible.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now I ask of you — esteemed trainers. Have you witnessed, and acknowledged, my true potential?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Doubtless, there are numerous areas in which I still fall short, and the throne at the pinnacle I strive to reach remains distant.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: All the more reason why I seek a companion who is willing to walk the path to it — that imperial road — alongside me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Should you believe yourself the one capable, I implore you to step forth.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Eugh, impressive speech, but… with a horsegirl of her caliber…

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Y-Yeah. If she doesn't emerge victorious… it would reflect poorly on her trainer, wouldn't it…?
Indeed, from a trainer's perspective, taking charge of someone like Symboli Rudolf is a very high-risk endeavor…
In the end, no one stepped forward to accept this challenge and the trainers dispersed…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Alright… I should get going!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: It's Symboli Rudolf entering the final straight! Her speed's increased even further! She's extending the gap to the competition with ease!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: No one can catch up! This is a dominant display that makes you believe the Triple Crown isn't beyond reach——!!
—— Symboli Rudolf's incredible, overwhelming performance just wouldn't leave my mind.
I didn't sleep very well that night……
The following day, when I found myself walking to the training course ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you… I recognize you from the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: A trainer, personally paying a visit to the contender of a Selection Race… Can I take it that you are here to scout me?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: In which case, allow me to ask you one thing. …… With what purpose have you come to see me?
choice_data_list: I wanted to see more of your running.
I wanted to see more of your running.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I see. To "see more of your running"… In other words, you carry expectations for the future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: There were in fact two other trainers who visited me after the race.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: One expressed their determination to make me stronger, while the other declared their commitment to walk alongside me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Trainer, in three days' time I will once more put this question to you and the others.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: At that time, I want you to exemplify your answer in some manner.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I apologize for giving you this test of sorts. But the matter is of great importance to me as well.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: To stand at the top, acknowledged by everyone, acting as a guide to every horsegirl — that is the mission I have imposed upon myself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: One cannot waste time on superficial trivialities in the quest to achieve such aspirations.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Until three days from now then. … I will eagerly await your answer.
Symboli Rudolf locked eyes with me, carrying a calm and gentle smile as she delivered those words.
